tool.name: Plot Extracted Ion Chromatogram
tool.description: Plot the extracted ion chromatogram (EIC) from mzML file

configfiles.configfile: library(xcms) library(MsExperiment) library(Spectra) mse = readMsExperiment(file.path('${input}')) offset = ${tolerance_ppm} * 1e-6 * ${mz_value} chr = chromatogram(mse, mz = ${mz_value} + c(-offset, offset), msLevel = ${mslevel}) png(filename = '${plot_output}') plot(chr) dev.off()

param.name: tolerance_ppm
param.label: Tolerance (ppm)
param.help: Tolerance for m/z value in ppm

tool.help: This tool plots the extracted ion chromatogram (EIC) based on the provided m/z value and tolerance from an mzML file.
